name: COMET STRIKE
description: Mysteries await in five new unexplored sections of space. Each area contains unique fast-action puzzles that will test both wit and physical ability. Explore and clear the levels to unlock new skills, special blocks, and areas.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz 4.00GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1080 Storage: 1 GB available space
